outputs.output_descr: This initiation plan is a step to arrange all necessary studies and surveys for the preparation of a UNDP Project Document which aims at supporting the Syrian Government in the reform and modernization of the Syrian Post authority Services. The main objective of the project IS to enhance the institutional capacities of the Post authority it into a profitable institute.

project_descr: PA FOR Modernization of Syrian Post Authority Services (SYR/05/020)
project_title: IP to the Modernization of Syrian Post Authority Service
